companyInfo: Aloha Dijital is a software company located in Teknopark. It focuses on strengthening the digital presence of businesses and providing them with a competitive advantage. The company leverages its experience and expert team to deliver these services.
detailedDescription: Aloha Dijital is a technology company dedicated to providing innovative solutions in the digital world. Our services include custom software development, web and mobile application development, social media management, and digital marketing. Established in 2018 and based in Marmara University Technopark, we serve both national and international clients. Through Aloha Dijital Akademi, we also offer specialized training programs aimed at cultivating the next generation of tech talent, focusing on web and mobile development with a commitment to employment opportunities. companyInfo: Aiku AI Startup Platform brings together AI startup products. The platform offers a centralized location to discover and engage with various AI solutions. It focuses on supporting and showcasing emerging AI technologies.
detailedDescription:
Aiku AI Startup Platform serves as a central hub, connecting AI startups with users, investors, and collaborators. The platform provides a curated environment for exploring and showcasing innovative AI solutions.

Key features include a comprehensive directory of AI startup products, user-friendly search and filtering options, and direct engagement opportunities with the companies behind these solutions.

The platform is designed for individuals and organizations seeking to leverage AI technologies, as well as for AI startups looking to increase their visibility and expand their network.

Aiku AI Startup Platform offers a unique value proposition by simplifying the discovery process, fostering collaboration, and accelerating the growth of emerging AI companies.

companyInfo: beSirius provides an AI-driven platform for managing sustainability data in industries.
detailedDescription: beSirius offers an AI-driven platform focused on sustainability management for the metals, mining, and heavy industries. The solution simplifies the collection and analysis of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data, enabling companies to track their sustainability efforts effectively. By streamlining data sharing processes, beSirius helpsteams save significant time in reporting and compliance activities. The platform is designed to enhance transparency and facilitate better decision-making regarding sustainability initiatives. Through its user-friendly interface, beSirius supports organizations in meeting their ESG obligations while fostering a culture of accountability and improvement in sustainability practices.

companyInfo: Ember is a software platform to automate the accounting process for SMEs.
detailedDescription: Leveraging Open Banking, Machine Learning & Making Tax Digital, Ember is the first solution to automate the entire accounting process from bank transaction through to tax submission without ever leaving the platform, rendering expensive accounting software and manual bookkeeping redundant.

companyInfo: pyannoteAI offers a speaker intelligence and diarization platform for developers. It specializes in detecting segment labels and separating speakers across various languages. The company provides tools for advanced audio analysis and speaker identification.
detailedDescription:
The Speaker Intelligence and Diarization Platform is designed for developers seeking to integrate advanced audio analysis capabilities into their applications. It offers tools to accurately detect segment labels and separate speakers in audio recordings, supporting multiple languages.

Key features of the platform include real-time speaker identification, batch audio processing, and language-agnostic performance. The platform's API allows for seamless integration into existing systems, providing developers with the flexibility to customize and extend its functionality.

The platform targets developers, researchers, and organizations focused on audio processing, speech analytics, and natural language understanding. It addresses the growing demand for accurate and efficient speaker diarization solutions across various industries.

The Speaker Intelligence and Diarization Platform stands out due to its focus on developer accessibility, its comprehensive language support, and its robust API. By leveraging this platform, developers can enhance their applications with state-of-the-art speaker intelligence capabilities.

companyInfo: Qevlar specializes in autonomous security operations center solutions to enrich, investigate, contextualize, and triage security alerts, enhancing defense mechanisms and overall SOC performance. Qevlar AI's platform integrates seamlessly with existing security infrastructures, automating Level 1 analyst tasks without manual intervention,thereby enhancing efficiency and accuracy in threat analysis.
detailedDescription:
Qevlar is a cybersecurity company specializing in autonomous Security Operations Center (SOC) solutions that transform how organizations detect, analyze, and respond to threats. Its AI-powered platform enhances SOC performance by enriching, investigating, contextualizing, and triaging security alerts in real time — significantly reducing the noise and time-to-response in increasingly complex threat environments.

Designed to integrate seamlessly with existing security infrastructures (e.g., SIEM, EDR, and threat intelligence platforms), Qevlar automates Level 1 analyst tasks such as initial triage, alert correlation, and basic investigation. This automation eliminates the need for manual intervention at the early stages of incident response, enabling SOC teams to focus on higher-level threats and strategic mitigation efforts.

By improving both the efficiency and accuracy of threat analysis, Qevlar helps organizations minimize dwell time, reduce alert fatigue, and maintain stronger, more proactive security postures — even with limited analyst resources.

companyInfo: Etiq AI assists data scientists by providing debugging across the full ML pipeline. It offers real-time testing as users code and learns how they work. Etiq AI aims to reduce pressure on data scientists.
detailedDescription:
Etiq AI focuses on easing the burden on data scientists by offering solutions for debugging machine learning pipelines. The company is dedicated to providing tools that enhance efficiency and accuracy in the development and deployment of AI models.

Etiq AI offers real-time testing capabilities that allow data scientists to identify and resolve issues as they code. The platform learns user workflows to provide customized support and streamlined debugging processes.

The company's primary target audience is data scientists and machine learning engineers working across various industries. Etiq AI aims to serve professionals seeking to optimize their development processes and improve the reliability of their AI models.

Etiq AI differentiates itself through its ability to provide real-time debugging and personalized learning within the ML pipeline. This approach facilitates a more efficient and less stressful environment for data scientists, leading to faster development cycles and improved model performance.

companyInfo: Auquan is a fintech company that uses AI and machine learning to help investment professionals make better decisions by turning unstructured data into actionable financial insights.
detailedDescription:
Auquan is a data science and AI-driven fintech company that empowers investment professionals by transforming complex, unstructured data into meaningful insights. Using advanced natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning technologies, Auquan’s platform automates the extraction of signals from a wide range of alternative and traditional data sources—such as financial news, earnings calls, and regulatory filings.

Designed for asset managers, hedge funds, and research teams, the platform helps uncover risks, identify opportunities, and enhance investment strategies without requiring deep technical expertise. By enabling scalable, explainable, and customizable data analysis, Auquan reduces research time, improves decision-making accuracy, and helps firms stay ahead in a data-intensive financial landscape.

companyInfo: TON DC is an internet company that operates as a decentralized network data center, supporting the dynamic development of the TON ecosystem.
detailedDescription:
Edge Data Center Operator TON Provider extend the edge of the network to deliver cloud computing resources and cached streaming content to local end users delivering faster services with low latency thanks to edge caching. TON Provider is an internet company that provides data center services for TON blockchain orient projects, companies andbusinesses. TON DC Cluster, TON Edge Services exclusively designed for decentralized TON infrastructure, simplifying the TON Blockchain journey for users and developers alike. It embodies the fundamental right to digital property for everyone.
We firmly believe that providing a robust and resilient infrastructure for TON users and developers is crucial for the successful future development of TON. The decentralized principles underpinning the structure of TON Datacenters Clusters are pivotal because they form the foundation for highly resilient and flexible network scalability. Only a distributed network structure across multiple TON Datacenters in different countries and jurisdictions can guarantee independence from local governments, industrial lobbies, and financial structures.

TON DC Cluster services encompass physical colocation and hosting services for infrastructure, as well as dedicated data center services for various TON projects, including hosting services for startups based on TON technologies, serving as incubators.

companyInfo: Mindset AI is a technology company using AI and automation to help human-capital businesses scale.
detailedDescription: Mindset AI is a technology company using AI and automation to help human-capital businesses scale. It provides learners and users with a branded, fully configurable, and simple-to-use platform for your workshops, micro-learning, online content, surveys, psychometric tests, 360s, communities, client reporting, engagement tracking, and otheractivities. End users can access a truly connected customer experience via mobile, web, tablets, and even wearables via a single platform. The company allows users to log in on a daily basis and observe their patterns and reflections in order to encourage positive behavioral change and inform business decisions.

companyInfo: Worry-free heart care from home enabled by commercially available trackers and cutting edge AI
detailedDescription: With Kardi Ai, we aim to offer medical grade cardiac home monitoring for a low cost by utilizing AI to achieve EKG level performance from a low-cost wearable that is available to the patient any time they need it. The Kardi AI kit is available from your cardiologist and contains all you'll need to have at home, cardiac monitoring whenever youneed. Kardi AI's artificial neural network will monitor and diagnose your heart every day, letting you know if you should contact your doctor or go to the emergency room.

companyInfo: Assiduous offers a digital platform for transaction planning, focusing on making companies financeable.
detailedDescription: Assiduous is a financial technology company that specializes in digital transaction planning. It provides a platform designed to assist business owners in preparing for successful future transactions, focusing on making companies financeable. Assiduous operates with a mission to enable business owners globally to build valuable businesses,leveraging capital markets technology. The company's services are tailored towards the future of corporate finance, particularly for small and medium-sized enterprises. Through its platform, Assiduous aims to simplify the complexities of financial transactions and corporate finance, offering tools and resources for effective planning and execution.

companyInfo: AMPLY Discovery, founded in 2021 in Belfast, is a biotech spin-out from Queen’s University. It uses AI and synthetic biology for drug discovery, focusing on cancer, infectious diseases, and metabolic disorders. Its AMPLYfolio AI platform identifies and validates new drug candidates. The company has raised over £1.4 million in grants and plans a £1.4 million seed round in 2024.
detailedDescription: AMPLY Discovery is an innovative biotech company based in Belfast, established in 2021 as a spin-out from Queen’s University Belfast. The company operates at the intersection of artificial intelligence and synthetic biology, aiming to transform the drug discovery process by making it faster, more precise, and cost-effective. Through its advanced AMPLYfolio AI platform, the company digitizes a wide range of biological datasets to uncover novel therapeutic candidates, which are subsequently validated through laboratory synthesis and testing. AMPLY Discovery focuses on addressing urgent medical needs, particularly in areas such as drug-resistant infections and hard-to-treat cancers, including Acute Myeloid Leukaemia and multi-drug resistant tuberculosis. Backed by over £1.4 million in grants from Innovate UK and Innosuisse, the company is actively expanding its research capabilities and preparing for a significant seed funding round of £1.4 million planned for 2024. This investment will support the scaling of its proprietary platform, enabling AMPLY to strengthen its position as a key player in the AI-driven biotech space and foster collaborations with global pharmaceutical partners.

companyInfo: ai|coustics is a Berlin-based startup founded in 2021, specializing in AI-powered speech enhancement. Its platform uses advanced algorithms for real-time noise reduction and speech clarity across telecom, broadcasting, and consumer electronics. The company has raised over $7.6 million from investors like Partech Partners and Connect Ventures.
detailedDescription: ai|coustics is an innovative startup headquartered in Berlin, established in 2021 with a mission to revolutionize speech enhancement through artificial intelligence. The company has developed a proprietary audio enhancement platform that leverages cutting-edge AI algorithms to deliver real-time speech clarity and noise reduction across multiple industries, including telecommunications, broadcasting, and consumer electronics. By offering its technology via flexible APIs and SDKs, ai|coustics enables companies to integrate studio-quality audio capabilities directly into their products and services, ensuring a seamless and natural communication experience regardless of device or environment. The company’s technology not only removes background noise but also enhances speech intelligibility, making it valuable for both live and recorded audio. Backed by over $7.6 million in funding from leading investors such as Partech Partners, Inovia Capital, and Connect Ventures, ai|coustics is rapidly expanding its partnerships with global tech companies and aims to set a new standard for voice authenticity and sound quality in digital communications.

companyInfo: FlexAI is a Paris-based startup founded in 2023 by former engineers from NVIDIA, Apple, Tesla, and Intel. The company specializes in AI compute infrastructure, aiming to simplify and democratize access to AI workloads through its Workload-as-a-Service (WaaS) platform. FlexAI has secured $30 million in seed funding from investors including Alpha Intelligence Capital, Elaia Partners, and Heartcore Capital. Its mission is to provide developers with seamless, efficient, and scalable AI computing sol
detailedDescription: FlexAI is a Paris-based technology startup founded in 2023 by a team of industry veterans from leading tech companies such as NVIDIA, Apple, Tesla, and Intel. The company is on a mission to redefine the future of AI computing by addressing the inefficiencies and rigidity of traditional compute infrastructure. FlexAI has developed an innovative Workload-as-a-Service (WaaS) platform, which abstracts the complexities of AI workloads from the underlying hardware, allowing developers to deploy, scale, and optimize AI applications effortlessly across a range of environments and devices. This approach not only democratizes access to high-performance AI compute but also accelerates time-to-market for companies building AI-powered solutions. Backed by a $30 million seed investment from Alpha Intelligence Capital, Elaia Partners, and Heartcore Capital, FlexAI is leveraging its proprietary technology to create a universal AI compute layer, enabling seamless integration with major hardware and cloud providers. Through this, the company aims to unlock the full potential of AI innovation by making high-performance computing flexible, accessible, and developer-friendly on a global scale.

companyInfo: Claro is a Berlin-based startup founded in 2024 by Matteo Fava and Tameesh Biswas. The company focuses on transforming unstructured business data into actionable insights through custom AI models and agents. Claro's platform automates data preparation and model generation, enabling businesses to leverage advanced AI without requiring deep technical expertise. In February 2025, Claro secured €650K in pre-seed funding from investors including Atlas SGR, Antler, Founders Factory, Fastweb, Plug & Pl
detailedDescription: Claro, a Berlin-based startup founded in 2024 by Matteo Fava and Tameesh Biswas, is dedicated to helping businesses manage and derive insights from unstructured data. The company's platform automates the conversion of fragmented and messy data into structured, actionable information, enabling companies to use AI-driven tools without requiring advanced technical expertise. Claro employs cutting-edge AI methods such as small language models (SLMs), knowledge distillation, and model compression to build custom models tailored to the specific needs of each business. This approach simplifies the integration of AI into business processes and supports decision-making and automation. In February 2025, Claro raised €650K in pre-seed funding from a group of investors, including Atlas SGR, Antler, Founders Factory, Fastweb, Plug & Play, and D11Z, which will help them further enhance their platform and expand their services.

companyInfo: Howie is an AI tool designed to assist architects and engineers by automating tasks, optimizing designs, and enhancing workflow efficiency. It acts as a digital copilot, leveraging AI to streamline professional processes.
detailedDescription:
Howie is an AI-driven copilot built to accelerate the day‐to‐day work of architects and engineers by automating repetitive tasks and intelligently parsing project data. It can instantly generate and update floor plans, annotate CAD/BIM models, and extract dimensions and material specifications from PDFs, scans, and point clouds—eliminating manual data entry and reducing errors. By embedding generative and parametric design engines directly into tools like Revit, AutoCAD, Rhino/Grasshopper, SAP2000, and ETABS, Howie lets you explore dozens of schematic alternatives based on constraints such as daylight targets, structural spans, and adjacency requirements, then applies evolutionary and gradient‐based optimization to refine layouts for energy performance, material efficiency, or cost goals.

Seamlessly integrating with your existing workflow, Howie syncs live project views across teams, maintains version control and change logs, and supports real‐time collaboration through cloud‐based sharing and annotation. Intelligent templates adapt to local building codes, climate data, and material libraries, while on‐demand simulations deliver instant feedback on structural integrity, thermal comfort, and daylighting metrics. Predictive analytics monitor schedules and budgets, flagging deviations early and suggesting corrective actions, and automated documentation tools draft specification reports and client presentations. With end‐to‐end encryption, granular access controls, and an open API for custom extensions, Howie scales to meet the evolving needs of any practice, empowering professionals to focus on creativity and strategic decision-making.

companyInfo: Telli, a Berlin-based startup founded in 2024, creates AI voice agents for automating customer interactions like lead qualification and scheduling. Using advanced AI models, Telli offers human-like conversations in multiple languages. The company raised $3.6 million in pre-seed funding in April 2025 to expand its technology.
detailedDescription: Telli is a Berlin-based startup founded in 2024 by Finn zur Mühlen, Philipp Baumanns, and Seb Hapte-Selassie, all former executives at Enpal, a leading German energy startup. Drawing from their experience in scaling customer service operations, they developed Telli to address the challenges of high-volume customer interactions. Telli's AI voice agents are designed to automate tasks such as lead qualification, appointment scheduling, and product recommendations, enabling human agents to focus on more complex queries. The platform utilizes voice cloning technology from ElevenLabs and Cartesian AI, combined with advanced AI models like OpenAI's GPT and Claude, to deliver natural, human-like conversations. Telli's system supports multiple languages and integrates with various communication channels, including SMS, to provide a seamless customer experience. Since its inception, Telli has processed nearly one million calls, demonstrating significant growth and efficiency. In April 2025, the company secured $3.6 million in pre-seed funding from investors including Cherry Ventures and Y Combinator, aiming to expand its AI voice technology and further enhance customer engagement across various industries.

companyInfo: Artificial Societies focuses on predicting human behavior through the use of artificial societies. The company leverages advanced simulations and modeling techniques. It aims to provide insights into complex social dynamics.
detailedDescription:
The Artificial Societies Simulation Platform offers a sophisticated environment for simulating and analyzing human behavior within artificial societies. This platform allows users to create detailed models of social interactions, societal structures, and behavioral patterns. 

The platform's features include customizable agent behaviors, dynamic environment settings, and comprehensive data analytics. Users can simulate various scenarios, observe emergent behaviors, and test hypotheses related to social dynamics. The platform's advanced algorithms ensure accurate and reliable simulations, providing valuable insights into complex social phenomena.

The platform targets researchers, policymakers, and organizations aiming to understand and predict human behavior. It supports applications in areas such as urban planning, crisis management, and market research. 

Its strength lies in its ability to provide a controlled and scalable environment for studying social systems. The platform's user-friendly interface and robust simulation capabilities make it a valuable tool for gaining actionable insights into human behavior and social trends.

companyInfo: Saga makes it easy to collaborate on notes, docs, and tasks in one connected workspace, enhanced by Saga AI—our built-in assistant that helps you become more productive and speeds up your work.
detailedDescription:
Saga is a unified collaboration platform that brings notes, documents, and tasks into a single, connected workspace, eliminating the need to switch between multiple apps. With real-time editing, rich formatting, and seamless file sharing, teams can capture ideas, draft proposals, and assign action items all in one place. Built-in version history and granular permissions ensure every change is tracked and controlled, while integrated notifications and activity feeds keep everyone aligned on priorities and progress.

At the heart of Saga lies Saga AI, a context-aware assistant that accelerates your workflow by surfacing relevant information, suggesting next steps, and automating routine chores. Whether you need to summarize meeting notes, generate task checklists, or draft polished copy from bullet points, Saga AI steps in with intelligent recommendations and one-click actions. By learning your team’s conventions and adapting to your preferred style, it makes collaboration smoother, cuts down on busywork, and empowers everyone to focus on doing their best work.

companyInfo: Bloop.ai is a London-based startup offering an AI-powered code search and understanding platform. It allows developers to query and navigate codebases using natural language and supports legacy code modernization, including COBOL to Java conversion. The platform ensures privacy with on-device processing and integrates with local and cloud repositories.
detailedDescription: Bloop.ai, founded in 2021 in London, helps developers interact with and modernize their code through AI-driven tools. Its platform enables natural language querying of codebases, simplifying navigation, explanation, and code generation across multiple programming languages. Bloop also provides a specialized solution for converting legacy COBOL code into maintainable Java, supported by automated validation tools to ensure functional accuracy. The platform operates with a strong focus on data privacy by offering offline and on-device processing, while integrating smoothly with both local repositories and GitHub. With support from Y Combinator, Bloop aims to reduce technical debt and accelerate software modernization.

companyInfo: Runtheons is an Italian sports tech startup founded in 2023, using AI to create digital twins of athletes for personalized training and injury prevention. Its platform combines data from sensors and expert insights, supported by proprietary AI tools, to optimize performance and reduce risks.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2023 in Salò, Italy, Runtheons is a sports technology startup focused on enhancing athletic performance through advanced AI and expert-driven insights. The company builds digital twins of athletes by integrating data from motion sensors, physiological assessments, and psychological inputs, enabling the creation of highly personalized training programs and injury risk predictions. Runtheons utilizes three proprietary AI tools—Alfred for real-time athlete modeling, Jarvis for simulating different performance scenarios, and Lucy for forecasting outcomes and injury risks. This approach aims to improve training efficiency significantly while lowering injury probabilities. Runtheons operates on a subscription model and also earns from athlete-related revenues like sponsorships and club contracts, supported by investors including Fondazione Monte dei Paschi di Siena and 20Ventures.

companyInfo: Klart AI is a Paris-based startup offering an AI assistant that integrates with tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and WhatsApp to automate internal and customer communications. Using Serverless RAG technology and AI models, it provides accurate, real-time responses to improve productivity and reduce support workloads.
detailedDescription: Klart AI, founded in Paris, France, provides an advanced AI assistant that helps businesses streamline both internal and external communications by integrating directly with popular platforms such as Slack, Microsoft Teams, and WhatsApp. Leveraging Serverless Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology, Klart AI ensures accurate, real-time answers based on verified, company-specific knowledge. The system includes a Fact Checking feature to guarantee response reliability and supports multilingual communication, offering tools for email writing, content translation, and tailored product descriptions. Klart AI is fully compliant with GDPR and CCPA, with SOC2 certification and secure access management, enabling companies to automate up to 80% of routine inquiries while ensuring data privacy and operational efficiency.

companyInfo: Quack AI is a Lisbon-based startup founded in 2023, offering an AI-powered developer assistant via a VSCode extension to improve onboarding, code reviews, and team alignment. The company raised $500K in seed funding from Y Combinator.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2023 and based in Lisbon, Portugal, Quack AI offers an AI-powered developer assistant designed to improve engineering team alignment, speed up onboarding, and enhance code quality. Integrated as a VSCode extension, the tool delivers real-time, context-specific guidance by embedding team coding guidelines directly into the development workflow, helping developers navigate contribution processes and adhere to standards more efficiently. By promoting open-source-inspired collaboration within enterprises, Quack AI fosters better knowledge sharing and helps identify workflow bottlenecks for process improvement. The company took part in Y Combinator’s S23 batch, raising $500K in seed funding, and is also backed by Entrepreneur First and Agoranov.

companyInfo: RideCommerce is a London-based startup founded in 2021 that offers an AI-powered mobility platform for electric vehicle fleets. The company focuses on optimizing last-mile delivery and reducing carbon emissions through intelligent routing and real-time traffic analysis. It has participated in programs like Techstars Sustainability Paris and secured $120K in pre-seed funding.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2021 and headquartered in London, RideCommerce is an AI-driven mobility platform designed to decarbonize last-mile logistics and enhance fleet efficiency for electric vehicle (EV) operators. The platform integrates real-time traffic data, vehicle telematics, and predictive analytics to optimize delivery routes, reduce congestion, and lower emissions across Scope 1, 2, and 3. By leveraging technologies like 5G, LiDAR, and 3D perception, RideCommerce enables logistics companies to transition to greener, cost-effective transportation solutions. The company has been recognized for its commitment to sustainability, aligning with UN SDGs 9, 11, and 13. In 2024, RideCommerce participated in the Techstars Sustainability Paris Accelerator and raised $120K in pre-seed funding. Co-founded by Sreenath Rangapuram and Kumudha Puram, the startup continues to innovate in the clean mobility sector.

companyInfo: Shai is an Amsterdam-based startup founded in 2023, offering an AI-powered pre-production platform that transforms scripts into storyboards, shot lists, and production schedules. The platform streamlines the creative process, making it up to 20 times faster and more efficient. Shai has raised $100K in pre-seed funding and is backed by Antler and Founders Factory.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2023 and headquartered in Amsterdam, Shai is an AI-driven pre-production platform designed to revolutionize the creative process for film and advertising industries. By leveraging generative AI, Shai transforms scripts into detailed storyboards, shot lists, and production schedules, enabling creative teams to visualize, plan, and budget their projects with unprecedented speed and efficiency. This automation reduces pre-production time by up to 20 times, allowing for more agile and cost-effective workflows. The platform is particularly beneficial for smaller studios and agencies that may lack access to dedicated tools and resources. Shai has secured $100K in pre-seed funding and is supported by Antler and Founders Factory, reflecting its potential to disrupt the creative industry.

companyInfo: Telekinesis is a robotics startup based in Darmstadt, Germany, founded in 2020. The company offers Brainwave, an AI-powered platform that enables factory workers to design and deploy automation cells without needing robotics expertise. Telekinesis aims to democratize robotics by providing no-code solutions for complex manufacturing tasks. The company has raised $20K in seed funding from Techstars.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2020 and headquartered in Darmstadt, Germany, Telekinesis is revolutionizing industrial automation with its AI-driven platform, Brainwave. Designed for small-batch manufacturing, Brainwave empowers factory workers to autonomously create and deploy automation cells using a no-code interface. The platform integrates AI, computer vision, and flexible robotics to handle complex tasks such as cable harnessing, wire soldering, gear assembly, and quality inspection. Telekinesis' approach significantly reduces operational costs and enhances production efficiency, making advanced automation accessible to industries without requiring specialized robotics knowledge. The company is supported by Techstars and continues to innovate in the field of robotics.

companyInfo: Hoshii is a Zurich-based startup, founded in 2023, offering an AI-driven Workspace Platform for wholesalers. The platform automates data transfer from communication channels into ERP systems, improving workflow efficiency and reducing manual entry.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2023 and headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, Hoshii has developed the world's first AI Workspace Platform (AWP) tailored for the wholesale industry. The platform integrates seamlessly with existing ERP systems, automating the labor-intensive transfer of information such as orders, inquiries, and requests. By equipping ERP systems with AI capabilities and an integrated communication hub, Hoshii enables wholesalers to process data from inboxes into ERP systems within seconds, significantly reducing manual data entry and the risk of errors. The AI agents, including Adam, Bard, and Mina, continuously monitor business processes, make intelligent decisions, and take actions with minimal human input, allowing employees to focus on more strategic tasks. This automation leads to increased efficiency, reduced operational costs, and enhanced customer satisfaction.

companyInfo: Lucero Bio is a Swedish biotech startup founded in 2020, specializing in precision 3D cell culture handling for pharmaceutical applications. Their AI-driven platform integrates microfluidics and optical tweezers to automate the isolation and dispensing of individual spheroids, enabling scalable and reliable drug testing. Lucero's technology aims to enhance early-stage drug discovery by providing more accurate models for efficacy, toxicity, and safety assessments.
detailedDescription: Lucero Bio, established in 2020 and headquartered in Mölndal, Sweden, is a bioconvergence company that combines microfluidics, AI, and optical manipulation to address challenges in 3D cell culture handling. Their platform automates the selective isolation and dispensing of individual spheroids, significantly reducing human intervention from sample preparation to data analysis. This automation allows pharmaceutical companies to perform high-throughput testing of drug candidates, assessing efficacy, toxicity, and safety with greater precision. Lucero's technology is particularly valuable for personalized medicine, as it enables the use of patient-specific 3D cell models to predict drug responses more accurately. The company is supported by initiatives such as the European Innovation Council and partners like AstraZeneca's BioVentureHub, reflecting its potential to advance drug development processes.

companyInfo: DevisionX is a London-based AI computer vision company founded in 2017. It offers Tuba.AI, a no-code platform that enables businesses to label, train, and deploy AI vision applications across various industries, including manufacturing, retail, agriculture, and smart cities. The platform simplifies the development process, making AI accessible to users without technical expertise. DevisionX has partnered with Qualcomm Technologies to enhance its AI vision solutions.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2017 and headquartered in London, DevisionX specializes in AI-driven computer vision solutions. Its flagship product, Tuba.AI, is a no-code/low-code platform designed to streamline the process of building, training, and deploying AI vision applications. The platform caters to industries such as manufacturing, e-commerce, retail, agriculture, and smart cities, providing tools for tasks like quality inspection, product tagging, virtual try-on, and crop monitoring. Tuba.AI offers an intuitive workflow builder, customizable infrastructure (Tuba IaaS), and AI vision consultation services, aiming to democratize access to AI technology. In a strategic move to enhance its offerings, DevisionX has collaborated with Qualcomm Technologies to integrate its solutions with Qualcomm's AI Hub, facilitating optimized deployment on Snapdragon-powered devices and reducing latency. This partnership underscores DevisionX's commitment to delivering high-performance, cost-effective, and privacy-conscious AI vision solutions.

companyInfo: AION Energy is a Turkish startup founded by three co-founders—a chemist, a physicist, and a computer engineer—who began their journey sharing the same dorm room at Koç University. The company specializes in AI-driven lithium-ion battery design, aiming to accelerate development cycles and enhance performance through advanced modeling and simulations. AION's approach reduces development time by up to 3x and costs by 60%, facilitating faster market entry for high-performance battery solutions.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2020 and headquartered in Kayseri, Turkey, AION Energy is at the forefront of transforming battery cell development through artificial intelligence and advanced digital modeling. The company offers a comprehensive, AI-powered platform that streamlines the entire battery design process—from initial concept to prototype testing. By leveraging real-world data and sophisticated simulations, AION enables the creation of tailored battery cells that meet specific performance, safety, and longevity requirements. This approach not only accelerates development cycles but also significantly reduces costs, making high-performance, sustainable energy storage solutions more accessible. AION's commitment to innovation and efficiency positions it as a key player in the evolving energy sector.

companyInfo: Starkdata is a Lisbon-based AI startup founded in 2020, specializing in predictive analytics for enterprises. Their platform delivers AI-driven insights and forecasts across various industries, including retail, financial services, and healthcare. Key features include customer segmentation, churn prediction, sentiment analysis, and performance analytics. Starkdata emphasizes seamless integration, compliance, and user-friendly interfaces.
detailedDescription: Founded in 2020 and headquartered in Lisbon, Starkdata offers an AI-powered predictive analytics platform designed to transform business insights through advanced forecasting and data-driven decision-making. The platform provides tools for customer insights, performance analytics, and industry-specific forecasting, catering to sectors like retail, finance, and healthcare. Key features include customer segmentation, churn prediction, sentiment analysis, and performance analytics, all accessible through an intuitive, no-code interface. Starkdata emphasizes seamless integration with existing tools, scalability, and compliance with industry standards. Notably, the company has joined the NVIDIA Inception Program and is a formal signatory of the AI Pact, underscoring its commitment to responsible AI development. Starkdata's platform empowers businesses to make informed decisions, optimize operations, and drive growth across various industries.

companyInfo: Aeso is a startup that engages in the analysis of medical data using machine learning. Aeso unites data from the medical information systems of clinics and hospitals and conducts studies of real clinical practice for pharmaceutical, insurance companies and medical organization.
detailedDescription:
Aeso is a healthcare‐focused analytics startup that harnesses machine learning to turn disparate clinical data into deep, actionable insights. By securely aggregating and normalizing information from hospital information systems, electronic health records, laboratory databases, and other medical IT platforms, Aeso creates a unified, de-identified dataset reflecting real‐world clinical practice. This end-to-end data pipeline ensures compliance with HIPAA, GDPR, and other regional privacy regulations, giving pharmaceutical companies, insurers, and healthcare providers confidence that their analyses rest on accurate, ethically managed information.

On top of this integrated data foundation, Aeso applies advanced ML models—ranging from predictive risk‐scoring algorithms to natural language processing of clinical notes—to surface patterns in treatment effectiveness, adverse event signals, and patient care pathways. Its flexible platform delivers interactive dashboards, cohort‐builder tools, and custom report generators, enabling stakeholders to accelerate drug development decisions, refine reimbursement strategies, and optimize care delivery protocols. With robust API integrations, modular deployment options, and enterprise-grade security, Aeso empowers organizations to conduct large-scale studies of real clinical outcomes faster, more reliably, and with greater scientific rigor.

companyInfo: Tao Climate's AI FinTech API decarbonises aviation with hemp-based carbon removal revenues, SAF, and Space MRV for a net-zero future.
detailedDescription:
Tao Climate: Decarbonising Aviation with the Carbon API for the World

Tao Climate is revolutionising aviation’s transition to net-zero with a fintech-driven carbon removal and sustainability platform. Leveraging AI, satellite data, and nature-based solutions, we provide real-time, verifiable carbon removal credits while developing sustainableaviation fuel (SAF) and operational efficiencies to reduce emissions at scale.
Our proprietary AI Space MRV Carbon API, developed with support from Google and the European Space Agency, ensures trust and transparency in the rapidly growing carbon markets. Through industrial hemp—a fast-growing, high-impact carbon removal solution—we capture and store CO₂ while creating sustainable materials for infrastructure and fuel production.

Tao Climate’s aviation solutions include: Tao CX – Passenger-integrated carbon removal for airlines, unlocking new revenue streams. Tao OPS – Data-driven flight and ground operations optimisation, reducing fuel burn. Tao SAF – Scalable hemp-based SAF feedstock for sustainable aviation fuel production.

A finalist in Elon Musk’s XPRIZE Carbon Removal Top 100, Tao Climate is at the forefront of profitable, high-impact climate tech. We’re seeking visionary investors to scale our breakthrough solutions, unlocking a multi-billion-euro opportunity in aviation decarbonisation.

companyInfo: PredictLeads crawls billion of information pieces and using machine learning extracts company signals like: hiring intent, supply chain relationships, categorized events from news, competitors, business connections...
detailedDescription:
PredictLeads is an AI-driven intelligence platform that continuously crawls and ingests billions of data points—from news articles and press releases to regulatory filings, social media posts, job boards, and proprietary databases. By applying advanced machine learning, natural language processing, and graph-analysis techniques, it surfaces high-value “company signals” such as hiring intent, new supply-chain partnerships, categorized corporate events, shifts in competitive landscapes, and evolving business connections. This real-time signal extraction gives revenue, strategy, and partnership teams a comprehensive, constantly updated view of market dynamics.

With an intuitive signal library and customizable dashboards, PredictLeads lets users filter and prioritize triggers by industry, geography, company size, or signal type, then deliver them directly into CRMs, marketing automation platforms, or BI tools via RESTful APIs and webhooks. Built-in lead-scoring algorithms enrich prospect lists with predictive intent scores, enabling sales and marketing teams to focus outreach on the highest-potential accounts. By turning raw, unstructured data into actionable intelligence, PredictLeads accelerates go-to-market strategies, uncovers hidden opportunities, and helps organizations stay ahead of competitors.

companyInfo: A cutting-edge AI-powered platform designed to revolutionise energy storage and trading. Our primary focus is on optimising battery management for trading while prioritising longevity and performance. Through advanced ML algorithms, we provide tailored solutions that not only enhance energy storage capabilities but also ensure sustainable andefficient utilisation of energy storage solutions.
detailedDescription:
This AI-powered platform transforms battery energy storage into a dynamic trading asset by marrying real-time market intelligence with advanced machine-learning-driven battery management. Its core engine continuously forecasts wholesale and ancillary service prices, then optimizes charge/discharge schedules to maximize revenue through arbitrage, frequency regulation, or demand-response programs—all while actively monitoring state-of-health metrics to minimize degradation. By balancing financial returns against cycle life, temperature effects, and depth-of-discharge constraints, the system ensures batteries operate within ideal windows, preserving longevity and performance even under aggressive trading strategies.

Designed for seamless integration with existing energy management and SCADA systems, the platform offers customizable dashboards, API-driven connectivity to market exchanges, and automated reporting for compliance and asset owners. Users can back-test strategies on historical data, run “what-if” scenarios under varying price and weather conditions, and deploy AI agents that learn and adapt to evolving market dynamics. The result is a turnkey solution that not only boosts energy storage utilization and revenue but also supports sustainable grid operations by smoothing peaks, shifting load, and extending the useful life of battery assets.

companyInfo: truemetrics provides parking positions and entrance locations to enable faster drop-offs. Our data is generated by analyzing sensor data from drivers' smartphones, allowing truemetrics to identify precise parking and entrance locations, thereby simplifying the last meters of delivery.
detailedDescription:
Truemetrics is a location-intelligence platform that pinpoints optimal parking spots and building entrances to streamline the final “last-meter” leg of any delivery route. By anonymously aggregating and analyzing sensor data from drivers’ smartphones—GPS traces, accelerometer patterns, and Wi-Fi/Bluetooth beacons—Truemetrics identifies where vehicles can legally and safely park, then maps out the quickest pedestrian access points into facilities. This precision data eliminates guesswork and wasted time at drop-off, cutting idle minutes and reducing delivery costs.

Designed for easy integration into existing routing and fleet-management systems, Truemetrics offers real-time APIs, SDKs, and dashboard visualizations. Dispatchers can automatically factor in curated parking and entrance locations when planning routes, while drivers receive turn-by-turn guidance straight to the right door. Continuous machine-learning models adapt to changing urban layouts and traffic patterns, ensuring accuracy even in new neighborhoods or during construction. The result is faster drop-offs, happier customers, and more efficient use of delivery assets—right down to the very last meter.

companyInfo: World's first AI-powered EV battery pack scanner, identifying defects, enhancing safety, optimizing resource use, and reducing waste.
detailedDescription:
The company combines medical-grade computed tomography (CT) hardware with proprietary machine-learning software to non-invasively scan complete electric-vehicle (EV) battery packs and pinpoint internal defects—micro-cracks, structural fissures, and dendritic growth—without ever opening the casing. By feeding high-resolution 3D CT images through deep-learning models trained on thousands of pack inspections, the platform automatically detects and classifies anomalies in minutes that would otherwise take days to uncover, giving manufacturers and service providers rapid, data-driven insights into cell integrity and safety.

Built around modular, portable imaging units and cloud-connected analytics, the solution seamlessly integrates into both automotive service lines and stationary energy-storage systems (ESS). Its plug-and-play scanners can be deployed at vehicle maintenance facilities or ESS sites, while the ML engine continually refines detection algorithms based on new inspection data. The result is extended pack lifetimes, optimized performance, reduced downtime, and a clear path to second-life reuse—helping OEMs, fleet operators, and energy providers maximize value and safety across the full EV battery lifecycle.

companyInfo: Converge is building the next generation of wireless sensor networks for the industrial internet of things by augmenting existing sensors to help large industries replace manual monitoring with automated, continuous data collection and analytics.
detailedDescription:
Converge delivers a retrofit wireless sensor network solution that breathes new life into existing industrial instrumentation. By attaching ultra-low-power radio nodes to legacy sensors, Converge transforms static gauges, meters, and switches into continuously reporting IoT endpoints—eliminating the need for manual rounds or temporary data loggers. Its mesh-based architecture ensures reliable, self-healing connectivity across sprawling plants, enabling real-time visibility into temperature, pressure, vibration, flow, and more without expensive rip-and-replace projects.

On the software side, Converge provides a cloud-native analytics platform with customizable dashboards, rule-based alerts, and predictive-maintenance models. Data streams from hundreds or thousands of augmented sensors feed machine-learning algorithms that detect anomalies, forecast equipment health, and surface process optimizations. With seamless integrations into SCADA, MES, and enterprise asset-management systems via RESTful APIs and OPC-UA, Converge empowers large manufacturers, utilities, and infrastructure operators to move from reactive firefighting to proactive, data-driven operations—driving uptime, safety, and sustainable efficiency.

companyInfo: Autumn AI makes machine learning and artificial intelligence accessible for developers and companies.

Leaf is a cross-platform machine intelligence framework that has a clear architecture and no external dependencies besides Collenchyma. Leaf is easy tomaintain, easy to use, and performant. Collenchyma is a portable, platform-agnostic, and high-performance computation framework. Applications build with Collenchyma deploys and executes in parallel on one or many heterogeneous devices on any host machine. The features of the platform are performant, practical, and portable.
Autumn AI is a Germany-based company that was founded in 2015 by Michael Hirn and Maximilian Goisser.

Faster, smarter mediations that free professionals to focus on building relationships and delivering exceptional service—while PropWise handles the heavy lifting of data analysis and document orchestration.

companyInfo: Deep Breath is a Rotterdam-based MedTech startup founded in 2020, offering an AI-powered decision support system for optimizing mechanical lung ventilation in ICUs. Their platform detects unsafe ventilation modes, predicts complications like pneumonia and ARDS, and provides real-time, explainable recommendations to enhance patient outcomes and reduce ICU stays.
detailedDescription: Deep Breath, established in 2020 and headquartered in Rotterdam, Netherlands, is a MedTech startup revolutionizing intensive care unit (ICU) treatment through its AI-driven decision support system. The platform processes real-time data from patient data management systems (PDMS) and ventilators to detect unsafe ventilation modes and predict potential complications such as pneumonia, sepsis, acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), and barotrauma. By analyzing billions of breaths from hundreds of patients, Deep Breath provides clinicians with explainable, trustworthy recommendations to optimize mechanical ventilation settings. This approach not only enhances patient outcomes—reducing mortality rates by up to 15% and ICU stays by up to 20%—but also alleviates the workload of medical staff. Deep Breath's system is designed for seamless integration with various ventilators and medical devices, supporting both clinical and research applications.

detailedDescription: Founded in 2020 and headquartered in Milan, Italy, X-ENDER is a pioneering deeptech company developing decentralized control systems for autonomous machines. companyInfo: ThreeB IT is a german startup that runs a digital process management and automation SaaS platform for corporations of any industry and size.
detailedDescription:
We are a startup based in Ibbenbüren, where we’ve transformed our passion for software development into a profession. Since 2019, Thimo Buchheister and Thorsten Brügge—longtime collaborators as software engineers—have been committed to making digital processes accessible to everyone.

As CEO, Thimo Buchheister focuses on the ongoing development of our ThreeNamic platform. With extensive experience in mobile and cloud development, software engineering, databases, blockchain, and IT project management, he maintains a holistic view and ensures that our company and products stay at the leading edge of technology.

Our COO, Thorsten Brügge, is the creative and communicative force driving product innovation. He oversees development, stays in constant contact with customers and partners, and applies his machine learning expertise to automate ThreeNamic’s processes. Thorsten’s background in industry and sales gives him a vital perspective on functionality, enabling him to advise clients on every aspect of our offerings.

Many software solutions on the market require users to conform to rigid workflows or provide only static snapshots of data. Our vision is different: we offer software that adapts to each user’s needs, accompanies every step of their process, and documents it in real time. By enabling access from anywhere, we support modern, location-independent work.

Traditionally, only those with significant capital can afford custom software. ThreeNamic changes that by empowering every entrepreneur—regardless of size or sector—to tailor a digital solution to their exact requirements. This allows our clients to focus on their core strengths, with the confidence that our software is their ideal digital partner.

From our conversations with businesses, we know that many digital initiatives are still in their infancy. Adopting new software often means not only migrating data but also reshaping proven processes to fit the new system. That’s where we come in: our mission is to help companies become more efficient through digitization.

Whether you’re a fledgling startup or a global enterprise, ThreeNamic supports the digitization of all corporate processes—making operations more effective, transparent, and secure. From customer and employee training, event and meeting planning, and the digitization of education to the full automation of mission-critical workflows, ThreeNamic delivers the right solution for every challenge.
